pr_title: issue #675 enable tenant/datastore support for searchalltest

timeline.message:

Signed-off-by: Albert Wang <xuwang@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: it's not really an override? it's a specific implementation
timeline.author: prb112

replies.bodyText: en... interesting... this was not added by me, let me try to remove it and see
replies.author: albertwang-ibm

replies.bodyText: can not be removed, it's always be added back automatically. and the function is abstract, so seems have to override.
replies.author: albertwang-ibm

timeline.bodyText: addRequestHeaders - where does this come from what does it do?
timeline.author: prb112

replies.bodyText: this is used for adding the tenant and datastore headers.
replies.author: albertwang-ibm

timeline.bodyText: Should the test be renamed to indicate that it is testing a different tenant?
timeline.author: prb112

replies.bodyText: maybe event a comment explaining what is happening
replies.author: prb112

replies.bodyText: I wanted to just enable it for tenant specific test, but I don't want to change the default behavior - testing the default ds of the default tenant.    I just want to change the tenant in my local to do some simple performance tests against my test tenants.
replies.author: albertwang-ibm

replies.bodyText: good point, let me add comments
replies.author: albertwang-ibm

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this is necessary... Let it naturally fall out.
timeline.author: prb112

replies.bodyText: I added this on purpose for running inside eclipse, without this, in my tests, eclipse always shows the app is not finished - very annoying.
replies.author: albertwang-ibm
